text: Toxic gas, prewar foods, drugs, poisonous mons, and radiation.  None of that is healthy!
You bound up, ready to enjoy the cataclysm.
A steady diet of roadkill is how to beat the flu.  Who knew?!
Staying away from those rotting zombies seems like a prudent action . . .
You wake up remembering that most pre-Zday foods will hurt your health.
You wake up remembering that most pre-Zday foods will hurt your health.
Toxic gas is not so healthy, is it?
You feel like you've been eating dirt.  Try to moderate your temperature.
Toxic gas is not so healthy, is it?
You feel like you've been eating dirt.  Try to moderate your temperature.
You lay in bed for a second, wishing you were still asleep.
Perhaps eating the prepacked foodstuffs of the dead world have made you weak . . . ?
Those monsters all carry toxins, so maybe that's why you feel so sick now?
Those monsters all carry toxins, so maybe that's why you feel so sick now?
As you move, you feel a hot flash come on.  Are you really so old?
As you move, you feel a hot flash come on.  Are you really so old?
Perhaps all those toxins and combats are affecting you?  Maybe a sabbatical from fighting is in order.
You wake up with lead eyelids.  Most poisonous monsters will negatively affect your health when they hit you.
You wake up with lead eyelids.  Most poisonous and decaying monsters will negatively affect your health when they hit you.
You shiver as you awake, fully aware that your feet are are sweating.  You will slowly lose health if you don't moderate your internal temperature.
You shiver as you awake, fully aware that your feet are are sweating.  You will slowly lose health if you don't moderate your internal temperature.
Toxic gas is not so healthy to breathe in, is it?
